comments.creator: b56girard@gmail.com
comments.author: b56girard@gmail.com
comments.text:
CGL has a multi-threaded option. It appears to copy over data and process it in a worker thread. We should see if we can see any benefits for using this. I would be surprised if that was the case but it's worth a shot.

http://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#technotes/tn2085/_index.html
comments.raw_text:
CGL has a multi-threaded option. It appears to copy over data and process it in a worker thread. We should see if we can see any benefits for using this. I would be surprised if that was the case but it's worth a shot.

http://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#technotes/tn2085/_index.html
